1.name: real
1.description: handler applies/removes effect from unit

2.name: send for client
2.description: handler sends apply/remove packet to unit

4.name: change amount
4.description: handler updates effect on target after effect amount change

8.name: reapply
8.description: handler updates effect on target after aura is reapplied on target

16.name: stat
16.description: handler updates effect on target when stat removal/apply is needed for calculations by core

32.name: skill
32.description: handler updates effect on target when skill removal/apply is needed for calculations by core

1.name: IGNORE_GCD
1.description: Will ignore GCD

2.name: IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD
2.description: Will ignore Spell and Category cooldowns

4.name: IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST
4.description: Will ignore power and reagent cost

8.name: IGNORE_CAST_ITEM
8.description: Will not take away cast item or update related achievement criteria

32.name: IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS
32.description: Will not check if a current cast is in progress

128.name: CAST_DIRECTLY
128.description: In Spell::prepare, will be cast directly without setting containers for executed spell

256.name: IGNORE_AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAGS
256.description: Will ignore interruptible aura's at cast

512.name: IGNORE_SET_FACING
512.description: Will not adjust facing to target (if any)

2048.name: IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE
2048.description: Will ignore caster aura states including combat requirements and death state

4096.name: DISALLOW_PROC_EVENTS
4096.description: Disallows proc events from triggered spell (default)

65536.name: IGNORE_CASTER_AURAS
65536.description: Will ignore caster aura restrictions or requirements

131072.name: DONT_RESET_PERIODIC_TIMER
131072.description: Will allow periodic aura timers to keep ticking (instead of resetting)

262144.name: DONT_REPORT_CAST_ERROR
262144.description: Will return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT in CheckCast functions

524288.name: TREAT_PROC_AS_NON_TRIGGERED
524288.description: Will treat procs from this spell as if it wasn't triggered

1.name: STAY_ALIVE
1.description: If the player dies, the quest is failed.(question)

2.name: PARTY_ACCEPT
2.description: Escort quests or any other event-driven quests. If player in party, all players that can accept this quest will receive confirmation box to accept quest.

4.name: EXPLORATION
4.description: Involves the activation of an areatrigger.

8.name: SHARABLE
8.description: Allows the quest to be shared with other players.

32.name: HIDE_REWARD_POI
32.description: Not used currently: Unsure of content

64.name: RAID
64.description: Can be completed while in raid

128.name: TBC
128.description: Not used currently: Available if TBC expansion enabled only

256.name: NO_MONEY_FROM_XP
256.description: Not used currently: Experience is not converted to gold at max level

512.name: HIDDEN_REWARDS
512.description: Item and monetary rewards are hidden in the initial quest details page and in the quest log but will appear once ready to be rewarded.

1024.name: TRACKING
1024.description: These quests are automatically rewarded on quest complete and they will never appear in quest log client side.

4096.name: DAILY
4096.description: Daily repeatable quests (only flag that the core applies specific behavior for)

8192.name: FLAGS_PVP
8192.description: Having this quest in log forces PvP flag

16384.name: UNAVAILABLE
16384.description: Used on quests that are not generically available

32768.name: WEEKLY
32768.description: Weekly repeatable quests (only flag that the core applies specific behavior for)

131072.name: DISPLAY_ITEM_IN_TRACKER
131072.description: Displays usable item in quest tracker

262144.name: OBJ_TEXT
262144.description: Use Objective text as Complete text

524288.name: AUTO_ACCEPT
524288.description: The client recognizes this flag as auto-accept. However, NONE of the current quests (3.3.5a) have this flag. Maybe blizz used to use it, or will use it in the future.

1048576.name: PLAYER_CAST_ON_ACCEPT
1048576.description: Quests with this flag player submit automatically by special button in player GUI

2097152.name: PLAYER_CAST_ON_COMPLETE
2097152.description: Automatically suggestion of accepting quest. Not from npc.

1.name: SERVER_CONTROLLED
1.description: set only when unit movement is controlled by server - by SPLINE/MONSTER_MOVE packets, together with STUNNED; only set to units controlled by client; client function CGUnit_C::IsClientControlled returns false when set for owner

8.name: PVP_ATTACKABLE
8.description: allow apply pvp rules to attackable state in addition to faction dependent state

32.name: PREPARATION
32.description: don't take reagents for spells with SPELL_ATTR5_NO_REAGENT_WHILE_PREP

1048576.name: TAXI_FLIGHT
1048576.description: disable casting at client side spell not allowed by taxi flight (mounted?), probably used with 0x4 flag

2097152.name: DISARMED
2097152.description: 3.0.3, disable melee spells casting..., "Required melee weapon" added to melee spells tooltip.

16777216.name: PLAYER_CONTROLLED
16777216.description: used in spell Eyes of the Beast for pet... let attack by controlled creature

2.name: UNK1
2.description: Hide unit model (show only player equip)

32.name: INSTANTLY_APPEAR_MODEL
32.description: Unit model instantly appears when summoned (does not fade in)

256.name: DISABLE_PRED_STATS
256.description: Player has disabled predicted stats (Used by raid frames)

1024.name: DISARM_RANGED
1024.description: this does not disable ranged weapon display (maybe additional flag needed?)

4096.name: RESTRICT_PARTY_INTERACTION
4096.description: Restrict interaction to party or raid

131072.name: PLAY_DEATH_ANIM
131072.description: Plays special death animation upon death

262144.name: ALLOW_CHEAT_SPELLS
262144.description: Allows casting spells with AttributesEx7 & SPELL_ATTR7_IS_CHEAT_SPELL

1.name: state
1.description: AuraType

2.name: school
2.description: SpellSchoolMask

512.name: ONTRANSPORT
512.description: Used for flying on some creatures

1024.name: DISABLE_GRAVITY
1024.description: Former MOVEMENTFLAG_LEVITATING. This is used when walking is not possible.

2048.name: ROOT
2048.description: Must not be set along with MOVEMENTFLAG_MASK_MOVING

4096.name: FALLING
4096.description: damage dealt on that type of falling

16777216.name: CAN_FLY
16777216.description: Appears when unit can fly AND also walk

33554432.name: FLYING
33554432.description: unit is actually flying. pretty sure this is only used for players. creatures use disable_gravity

268435456.name: WATERWALKING
268435456.description: prevent unit from falling through water

1.name: interrupt previous
1.description: Interrupt any spell casting

2.name: triggered
2.description: Triggered (this makes spell cost zero mana and have no cast time)

32.name: aura not present
32.description: only cast if target does not have aura from spell

64.name: combat move
64.description: Prevents combat movement if cast successful. Allows movement on range, OOM, LOS

128.name: wait for hit
128.description: When used in combination with `Await` action in timed action list, AI will wait for the spell to hit its target instead of just cast bar to finish

1.name: INSTANCE_BIND
1.description: creature kill bind instance with killer and killer's group

2.name: CIVILIAN
2.description: not aggro (ignore faction/reputation hostility)

256.name: NO_TAUNT
256.description: creature is immune to taunt auras and effect attack me

1024.name: GHOST_VISIBILITY
1024.description: creature will only be visible to dead players

4096.name: NO_SELL_VENDOR
4096.description: players can't sell items to this vendor

8192.name: IGNORE_COMBAT
8192.description: creature is not allowed to enter combat

16384.name: WORLDEVENT
16384.description: custom flag for world event creatures (left room for merging)

524288.name: OBEYS_TAUNT_DIMINISHING_RETURNS
524288.description: Taunt is a subject to diminishing returns on this creautre

1048576.name: ALL_DIMINISH
1048576.description: Creature is subject to all diminishing returns as player are

2097152.name: NO_PLAYER_DAMAGE_REQ
2097152.description: creature does not need to take player damage for kill credit

268435456.name: DUNGEON_BOSS
268435456.description: creature is a dungeon boss (SET DYNAMICALLY, DO NOT ADD IN DB)

1073741824.name: IMMUNITY_KNOCKBACK
1073741824.description: creature is immune to knockback effects

2.name: TRACK_UNIT
2.description: Creature's location will be seen as a small dot in the minimap

8.name: TAPPED_BY_PLAYER
8.description: Lua_UnitIsTappedByPlayer usually used by PCVs (Player Controlled Vehicles)

32.name: DEAD
32.description: Makes the creature appear dead (this DOES NOT make the creature's name grey or not attack players).

1.name: TAMEABLE
1.description: Makes the mob tameable (must also be a beast and have family set)

2.name: GHOST_VISIBLE
2.description: Creature are also visible for not alive player.

4.name: BOSS
4.description: Changes creature's visible level to "??" in the creature's portrait - Immune to Knockback.

8.name: DO_NOT_PLAY_WOUND_PARRY_ANIMATION
8.description: Does not play wound animation on parry.

128.name: CAN_INTERACT_WHILE_DEAD
128.description: Player can interact with the creature if its dead (not player dead).

1024.name: DO_NOT_LOG_DEATH
1024.description: Death event will not show up in combat log.

2048.name: MOUNTED_COMBAT_ALLOWED
2048.description: Creature can remain mounted when entering combat.

4096.name: FLAG_CAN_ASSIST
4096.description: Can aid any player in combat if in range.

65536.name: EXOTIC_PET
65536.description: Can be tamed by hunter as exotic pet.

131072.name: USE_DEFAULT_COLLISION_BOX
131072.description: Collision related. (always using default collision box?)

524288.name: CAN_COLLIDE_WITH_MISSILES
524288.description: Projectiles can collide with this creature - interacts with TARGET_DEST_TRAJ.

8388608.name: INTERACT_ONLY_WITH_CREATOR
8388608.description: Can only interact with its creator.

67108864.name: TREAT_AS_RAID_UNIT
67108864.description: Creature can be targeted by spells that require target to be in caster's party/raid.

134217728.name: FORCE_GOSSIP
134217728.description: Allows the creature to display a single gossip option.

1048576.name: MOUNT
1048576.description: Any effect that summons a mount

16777216.name: INVULNERABILITY
16777216.description: Forbearance, Nether Protection, Diplomatic Immunity only

268435456.name: IMMUNE_SHIELD
268435456.description: Divine Shield, Ice Block, Hand of Protection...

1.name: timed or dead despawn
1.description: despawns after a specified time OR when the creature disappears

2.name: timed or corpse despawn
2.description: despawns after a specified time OR when the creature dies

3.name: timed despawn
3.description: despawns after a specified time OR when the creature dies

4.name: timed despawn out of combat
4.description: despawns after a specified time after the creature is out of combat

6.name: corpse timed despawn
6.description: despawns after a specified time after death

8.name: manual despawn
8.description: despawns when Despawn action is called

0.name: trap with no despawn after cast
enabled, autocomplete
0.description: Quest is enabled, but it is auto-completed when accepted; this skips quest objectives and quest details.

1.name: disabled
1.description: Quest is disabled (not yet implemented in the core).

2.name: enabled
2.description: Quest is enabled (does not auto-complete).

4.name: auto-accept
4.description: As of patch 3.3.5a only quests in the starter area need this flag.

32.name: use spell cast kill credit
32.description: The quest requires RequiredOrNpcGo killcredit (a spell cast), but NOT an actual NPC kill. This action usually involves killing an invisible "bunny" NPC.

1.name: IN_USE
1.description: Gameobject in use - Disables interaction while being animated

2.name: LOCKED
2.description: Makes the Gameobject Locked. Requires a key, spell, or event to be opened. "Locked" appears in tooltip

32.name: NODESPAWN
32.description: Never despawns. Typical for gameobjects with on/off state (doors for example)

64.name: TRIGGERED
64.description: typically, summoned objects. Triggered by spell or other events

1.name: none
1.description: Player does not have or had quest at all. He could accept it, but he did not (yet).

2.name: complete
2.description: Player fulfilled objectives, but did not hand it in yet.

8.name: incomplete
8.description: Player did not fulfill objectives yet

32.name: failed
32.description: Player failed to fulfill objectives for any reason, e.g. time limit

64.name: rewarded
64.description: Player handed quest in and this is sort of a post-quest interaction

1.name: Vendor
1.description: Brown bag

2.name: Taxi
2.description: Flight

7.name: Talk
7.description: White chat bubble with black dots (...)

1.name: Gossip
1.description: Requires npc flag GOSSIP

2.name: Questgiver
2.description: Requires npc flag QUESTGIVER

3.name: Vendor
3.description: Requires npc flag VENDOR (Make sure there is npc_vendor data for this creature)

5.name: Trainer
5.description: Requires npc flag TRAINER (Remember to set trainer_class in creature_template)

16.name: Unlearn talents
16.description: Requires npc flag TRAINER (bonus option for GOSSIP_OPTION_TRAINER)

17.name: Unlearn pet talents
17.description: Requires npc flag TRAINER (bonus option for GOSSIP_OPTION_TRAINER)

18.name: Learn dual spec
18.description: Requires npc flag TRAINER (bonus option for GOSSIP_OPTION_TRAINER)

1.name: normal dungeon / 10 man raid normal / continent
friendly
1.description: (NOT used in client packet handler)

2.name: hostile
2.description: sent on every attack, triggers aggro sound (used in client packet handler)

3.name: afraid
3.description: seen for polymorph (when AI not in control of self?) (NOT used in client packet handler)

4.name: destroy
4.description: used on object destroy (NOT used in client packet handler)

1.name: UNIT_STATE_DIED
1.description: player has fake death aura

2.name: UNIT_STATE_MELEE_ATTACKING
2.description: player is melee attacking someone

8192.name: UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED
8192.description: area auras do not affect other players

CreatureSummonGroupSummonerTypeParameter.name: Creature summon group summoner type parameter

67108864.name: Only attack targets that are pvp enabling

4.name: Lock tappers to raid on death

8192.name: Return soul shard to master of pet

131072.name: Alert content team on 90 pct health

8388608.name: Do not tap credit to threat list

16777216.name: Disable dodge parry and block animations

67108864.name: Enemy check ignores line of sight

1073741824.name: Ai can auto takeoff in combat

2147483648.name: Ai can auto land in combat

2.name: Treat as player for diminishing returns

4.name: Treat as player for pvp debuff duration

64.name: Deals triple damage to pc controlled pets

1024.name: Update creature record when instance changes difficulty

8192.name: Other objects can ignore line of sight requirements when casting spells on me

16384.name: Give quest kill credit while offline

32768.name: Treat as raid unit for helpful spells

65536.name: Dont reposition because melee target is too close

131072.name: Pet guardian ai dont go behind target

1048576.name: Dont reposition with friends in combat

8388608.name: Suppress instance wide release in combat

16777216.name: Ai will only swim if target swims

33554432.name: Dont generate combat log when engaged with npcs

134217728.name: Prefer npcs when searching for enemies

536870912.name: Doesnt change target on right click

8192.name: Suppress highlight when targeted or moused over

65536.name: Assign kill credit to encounter list

262144.name: Ai cant path on steep slopes

524288.name: Ai ignore los to melee target

1048576.name: Never display emote or chat text in a chat bubble

2097152.name: Ai pets close in on unpathable target

4194304.name: Pet guardian ai dont go behind me

33554432.name: Can drop loot while in a challenge mode instance

2147483648.name: Give criteria kill credit when charmed

0.name: active
0.description: show in world as used and not reset (closed door open)

1.name: ready
1.description: show in world as ready (closed door close)

2.name: active alternative
2.description: show in world as used in alt way and not reset (closed door open by cannon fire)

16.name: disabled in map
16.description: Put map IDs in param0 field

32.name: disabled in area
32.description: Put area IDs in param1 field

1.name: Counter
1.description: Just count statistic (never stop and complete)

2.name: Hidden
2.description: Not sent to client - internal use only

4.name: Store max value
4.description: Store only max value? used only in "Reach level xx"

8.name: Summ
8.description: Use summ criteria value from all requirements (and calculate max value)

16.name: Max used
16.description: Show max criteria (and calculate max value ??)

32.name: Req count
32.description: Use not zero req count (and calculate max value)

64.name: Average
64.description: Show as average value (value / time_in_days) depend from other flag (by def use last criteria value)

128.name: Bar
128.description: Show as progress bar (value / max vale) depend from other flag (by def use last criteria value)

0.name: Noone assists noone and member don't follow the leader

1.name: The member aggroes if the leader aggroes

2.name: The leader aggroes if the member aggroes

3.name: Everyone assists everyone and member don't follow the leader

512.name: Noone assists noone and member follow the leader

515.name: Everyone assists everyone and member follow the leader

8.name: ITEM_FLAG_HEROIC_TOOLTIP (NOT IMPLEMENTED) - Makes green 'Heroic' text appear on item

32.name: Item can not be destroyed, except by using spell (item can be reagent for spell)

64.name: ITEM_FLAG_PLAYERCAST (NOT IMPLEMENTED) - Item's spells are castable by players

128.name: No default 30 seconds cooldown when equipped (for 'On use' items)

512.name: Wrapper : Item can wrap other items

2048.name: Item is party loot and can be looted by all

16384.name: ITEM_FLAG_HAS_TEXT (NOT IMPLEMENTED) - Only readable items have this (but not all)

32768.name: ITEM_FLAG_NO_DISENCHANT (NOT IMPLEMENTED) - If enabled, prevent disenchanting. Implemented in another column RequiredDisenchantSkill

65536.name: ITEM_FLAG_REAL_DURATION (NOT IMPLEMENTED) - Probably real time duration. Implemented in another column flagsCustom

131072.name: ITEM_FLAG_NO_CREATOR (NOT IMPLEMENTED OR PARTIALLY) - Maybe to remove the 'Made by XX' message on crafted/summoned item or for signing charters

524288.name: Unique equipped (player can only have one equipped at the same time but as many as he wants in his bags, if maxcount = 1, it will still display Unique-Equipped)

2097152.name: Item can be used during arena match

8388608.name: Item can be used in shapeshift forms

33554432.name: Profession recipes: can only be looted if you meet requirements and don't already know it

67108864.name: Item cannot be used in arena

134217728.name: Bind to Account (Requires to set Bonding > 0)

268435456.name: Spell is cast with triggered flag (in code it's written Spell is cast ignoring reagents and the flag is called ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)

4.name: When item uses ExtendedCost in npc_vendor, gold is also required

256.name: Makes need roll for this item disabled

7.name: Heirlooms (or some Bind to Account items)

14.name: Shield (class = armor, not weapon even if in weapon slot)

23.name: Held in Off-Hand (tome, cane, flowers, torches, orbs etc... See also Off-Hand = 22) (class = armor, not weapon even if in weapon slot)

28.name: Relic (class = armor, not weapon even if in weapon slot)

1.name: Two Handed Weapon
1.description: Diagonally across the back pointing downwards.

2.name: Staff
2.description: Diagonally across the back pointing upwards.

3.name: One Handed
3.description: On the left-hand side of the character's waist.

4.name: Shield
4.description: On the middle of the character's back.

6.name: Off hand
6.description: On the right-hand side of the character's waist.

1.name: ITEM_FLAGS_CU_DURATION_REAL_TIME
1.description: Item duration will tick even if player is offline

2.name: ITEM_FLAGS_CU_IGNORE_QUEST_STATUS
2.description: No quest status will be checked when this item drops

4.name: ITEM_FLAGS_CU_FOLLOW_LOOT_RULES
4.description: Item will always follow group/master/need before greed looting rules

0x00000100.name: SESSILE
0x00000100.description: Rooted movementflag, creature is permanently rooted in place

0x00000400.name: NO_AUTOMATIC_REGEN
0x00000400.description: Creatures with that flag uses no UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER

0x00010000.name: BOSS_MOB
0x00010000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_BOSS_MOB, original description: Raid Boss Mob

0x00080000.name: AMPHIBIOUS
0x00080000.description: Creatures will be able to enter and leave water but can only move on the ocean floor when CREATURE_STATIC_FLAG_CAN_SWIM is not present

0x00100000.name: NO_MELEE_FLEE
0x00100000.description: 'No Melee (Flee)' Prevents melee (moves as-if feared, does not make creature passive)

0x00400000.name: PVP_ENABLING
0x00400000.description: Old UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ENABLING, now UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_PVP_FLAG from UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2

0x02000000.name: IGNORE_COMBAT
0x02000000.description: Actually only changes react state to passive

0x04000000.name: ONLY_ATTACK_PVP_ENABLING
0x04000000.description: 'Only attack targets that are PvP enabling'

0x08000000.name: CALLS_GUARDS
0x08000000.description: Creature will summon a guard if player is within its aggro range (even if creature doesn't attack per se)

0x00000004.name: LOCK_TAPPERS_TO_RAID_ON_DEATH
0x00000004.description: 'Lock Tappers To Raid On Death', toggleable by 'Set 'RAID_LOCK_ON_DEATH' flag for unit(s)' action, CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_INSTANCE_BIND

0x00000008.name: SPELL_ATTACKABLE
0x00000008.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_SPELL_ATTACKABLE, original description(not valid anymore?): No Harmful Vertex Coloring

0x20000000.name: CAN_ASSIST
0x20000000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_CAN_ASSIST, original description: Player Can Heal/Buff

0x00000008.name: MASK_UID
0x00000008.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_MASK_UID, original description: Non-Unique In Combat Log

0x00000400.name: GIGANTIC_AOI
0x00000400.description: Since MoP, creatures with that flag have UnitFlags2 0x400000

0x00000800.name: INFINITE_AOI
0x00000800.description: Since MoP, creatures with that flag have UnitFlags2 0x40000000

0x00020000.name: ATTACKER_IGNORES_FACING
0x00020000.description: In 3.3.5 used only by Rocket Propelled Warhead

0x00800000.name: CAN_BE_MULTITAPPED
0x00800000.description: Original description: Do Not Tap (Credit to threat list)

0x01000000.name: DO_NOT_PLAY_MOUNTED_ANIMATIONS
0x01000000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_DO_NOT_PLAY_MOUNTED_ANIMATIONS, original description: Disable Dodge, Parry and Block Animations

0x00000008.name: INTERACT_ONLY_WITH_CREATOR
0x00000008.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_INTERACT_ONLY_WITH_CREATOR, original description: Only Display Gossip for Summoner

0x00000020.name: HAS_NO_SHADOW_BLOB
0x00000020.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_HAS_NO_SHADOW_BLOB, original description(wrongly linked type flag or behavior was changed?): Can be Healed by Enemies

0x00000200.name: NO_MELEE_APPROACH
0x00000200.description: 'No Melee (Approach)' Prevents melee (chases into melee range, does not make creature passive)

0x00002000.name: IGNORE_LOS_WHEN_CASTING_ON_ME
0x00002000.description: 'Other objects can ignore line of sight requirements when casting spells on me', used only by Ice Tomb in 3.3.5

0x00008000.name: TREAT_AS_RAID_UNIT_FOR_HELPFUL_SPELLS
0x00008000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_TREAT_AS_RAID_UNIT, 'Treat as Raid Unit For Helpful Spells (Instances ONLY)', used by Valithria Dreamwalker

0x00010000.name: DONT_REPOSITION_IF_MELEE_TARGET_IS_TOO_CLOSE
0x00010000.description: 'Don't reposition because melee target is too close'

0x00200000.name: DO_NOT_SHEATHE
0x00200000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_DO_NOT_SHEATHE, original description: Manual Sheathing control

0x00400000.name: IGNORE_SPELL_MIN_RANGE_RESTRICTIONS
0x00400000.description: UnitFlags2 0x8000000, original description: Attacker Ignores Minimum Ranges

0x01000000.name: PREVENT_SWIM
0x01000000.description: UnitFlags2 0x1000000, original description: AI will only swim if target swims

0x02000000.name: HIDE_IN_COMBAT_LOG
0x02000000.description: UnitFlags2 0x2000000, original description: Don't generate combat log when engaged with NPC's

0x20000000.name: DO_NOT_TARGET_ON_INTERACTION
0x20000000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_DO_NOT_TARGET_ON_INTERACTION, original description: Doesn't change target on right click

0x40000000.name: DO_NOT_RENDER_OBJECT_NAME
0x40000000.description: CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_DO_NOT_RENDER_OBJECT_NAME, original description: Hide name in world frame

0x00100000.name: NO_TEXT_IN_CHAT_BUBBLE
0x00100000.description: 'Never display emote or chat text in a chat bubble', CREATURE_TYPEFLAGS_2_UNK4

0x00200000.name: CLOSE_IN_ON_UNPATHABLE_TARGET
0x00200000.description: 'AI Pets close in on unpathable target'

0x00400000.name: DONT_GO_BEHIND_ME
0x00400000.description: 'Pet/Guardian AI Don't Go Behind Me (use on target)'

0x00000002.name: REPLACE_VISIBLE_UNIT_IF_AVAILABLE
0x00000002.description: 'Smooth Phasing: Replace visible unit if available'

0x00000004.name: IGNORE_REALM_COALESCING_HIDING_CODE
0x00000004.description: 'Ignore the realm coalescing hiding code (always show)'

0x00000800.name: ALWAYS_STAND_ON_TOP_OF_TARGET
0x00000800.description: 'Always, ALWAYS tries to stand right on top of his move to target. ALWAYS!!', toggleable by 'Set 'Always Stand on Target' flag for unit(s)' or not same?

0x00004000.name: PREFER_UNENGAGED_MONSTERS
0x00004000.description: 'Prefer unengaged monsters when picking a target'
